title: The Rapture: In the Twinkling of an Eye
description: Book 3 of the 3-book prequel to the best-selling Christian fiction series that sold over 63 million copies!“The Left Behind series . . . is among the best-selling fiction books of our times―right up there with Tom Clancy and Stephen King.” ― TimeGet a glimpse into the lives of your favorite characters before they were left behind. You will find all these answers and more in this exciting series!The In the Twinkling of an Eye / Countdown to Earth’s Last DaysIn this the final prequel to the blockbuster series, the story alternates between events on earth immediately after the Rapture and characters in heaven as they view the chaotic events on earth.
author: Tim LaHaye
